text: ye’ālahinimi (yemameni) gemedi hulachihumi yazu፡፡ ātileyayumi፡፡ t’ebenyochimi beneberachihu gīzē be’inanite layi (yewalewini) ye’ālahini ts’ega āsitawisu፡፡ belibochachihumi mekakeli āsimama፡፡ bets’egawimi wenidimamachochi ẖonachihu፡፡ be’isati gudigwadi āfafimi layi neberachihu፡፡ ke’irisiwami ādanachihu፡፡ inidezīhu timeru zenidi ālahi le’inanite ānik’ets’ochuni yabirarali፡፡
